attributes.action: arrange for all MP’s pensions to be reduced without delay being the person with overall responsibility for his government’s legislative actions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This reduction to be commensurate with the reduction of so very many people’s pensions, directly resulting from the Chancellor's deliberate decision to scrap Advanced Corporation Tax, with the drastic damage this would wreak on the pensions of so many citizens.
